name: Down the Rabid Hole
description:
Down, down and away!

Face the dangers and unveil the mysteries of the Rabid Hole cave system in this action roguelite game!

This game is under development. I've made available a pre-pre-alpha version for you take a look. Honest feedback is dearly wanted!

I have plans for several features before the official release:

  • More enemies
  • More levels
  • More items
  • More attack types
  • More visual effects
  • Smarter AI
  • Boss fights
  • New graphics
  • Music
  • A non-horrendous Upgrade Screen
  • Some story
